name: 🔥ROLLFIRE
description:
Controls: A = Left | D = Right | S = Roll

This is a game where the main points of play are sound and visual, you have to rely on the sound of bullets and visual of fire to know what to roll from and what to get to.

Apples give you health, Fire bullets take away health.

Multiplayer might not work as expected, but I added it as a little cool feature.

Your only goal is to survive.

OTHER >>

Made with Scratch, then ported to Turbowarp

Music by me, Pixel art by me, Code by me, basically everything by me.

except all the fire stuff (animation, art)
